name: PKCE Proxy for Raycast
description: A barebones PKCE proxy to enable OAuth for OAuth providers that do not support PKCE

PROXY_HOSTNAME.description: The hostname where the proxy is deployed (for example "https://raycast-notion-pkce-proxy.herokuapp.com").

AUTHORIZE_URL.description: The URL where redirect the user for the authorization (for example "https://api.notion.com/v1/oauth/authorize").

TOKEN_URL.description: The URL where we exchange a code for a token (for example "https://api.notion.com/v1/oauth/token").

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret provided by the OAuth provider.
